targets.query: SELECT max("home") AS "Home usage", max("solar") AS "Solar Energy", max(from_pw) - max(to_pw) AS "Powerwall", max(from_grid) - max(to_grid) AS "Grid Usage", last("percentage")  /0.95 - 5/0.95 AS "Charge" FROM "autogen"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("temperature") AS "Temperature", mean("clouds") AS "Clouds", mean("feels_like") AS "Feels Like" FROM "autogen"."weather" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("grid_status") +1  FROM "grid"."http" WHERE grid_status = 0 and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("backup_reserve_percent") FROM "pod"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT last("load_instant_power")  AS "Home", last("solar_instant_power") AS "Solar", last("battery_instant_power") AS "Battery", last("site_instant_power") AS "Grid", last("percentage") AS "Percent", last("nominal_energy_remaining") AS "Charge Remaining" FROM "raw"."http" WHERE time >= now() - 10m
SELECT last("grid_status")  AS "Status" FROM "raw"."http" WHERE time >= now() - 10m
SELECT min("grid_status") FROM "grid"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous) tz('${tz:text}')
SELECT min("grid_status") + 2 FROM "grid"."http" WHERE grid_status = -1 and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) tz('${tz:text}')
SELECT min("grid_status") + 1 FROM "grid"."http" WHERE grid_status = 0 and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) tz('${tz:text}')

SELECT (home - from_grid) / home FROM 
  (SELECT integral("home")  AS home, integral("from_grid")  AS from_grid 
      FROM "autogen"."http" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT (integral("from_grid") - integral("to_grid"))   / 1000 / 3600 FROM "autogen"."http" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT fp FROM (SELECT sum("from_pw")  * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS fp FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter )
SELECT s - (tp + tg) FROM (SELECT sum("solar") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS s,  sum("to_pw")  * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS tp, sum("to_grid") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS tg FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter )
SELECT tgg FROM (SELECT sum("to_grid") * $avg_sell_per_kwh AS tgg FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter )

SELECT tgg + (s - tp - tg ) + fp FROM (SELECT sum("to_pw")  * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS tp, sum("solar") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS s, sum("to_grid") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS tg, sum("from_pw") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS fp, sum("to_grid") * $avg_sell_per_kwh AS tgg FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter )

SELECT  (1+from_solar/abs(from_solar))*from_solar/2  FROM (SELECT integral(solar)/1000/3600 - (integral(to_pw) - integral(grid_to_pw))/1000/3600  - integral(to_grid)/1000/3600  AS from_solar FROM (SELECT from_solar, solar, to_pw, to_grid, ((from_grid - home - solar) + ABS((from_grid - home - solar))) / 2 AS grid_to_pw FROM autogen.http WHERE  $timeFilter ))
SELECT integral("from_pw")  / 1000 / 3600 FROM "autogen"."http" WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT (integral(from_grid) - integral(grid_to_pw))/1000/3600  AS from_grid FROM (SELECT from_grid, ((from_grid - home - solar) + ABS((from_grid - home - solar))) / 2 AS grid_to_pw FROM autogen.http WHERE  $timeFilter )

SELECT last("load_instant_power") AS "Home", last("solar_instant_power") AS "Solar", last("battery_instant_power") AS "Battery", last("site_instant_power") AS "Grid" FROM "raw"."http" WHERE time >= now() - 10m

SELECT last("load_instant_power") AS "Home", last("solar_instant_power") AS "Solar", last("battery_instant_power") AS "Battery", last("site_instant_power") AS "Grid" FROM "raw"."http" WHERE time >= now() - 10m
SELECT sum("home") FROM "kwh"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0) tz('${tz:text}')
SELECT sum("home") FROM "kwh"."http" WHERE ("home" > 0) GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('${tz:text}')
SELECT sum("solar") FROM "kwh"."http" WHERE ("solar" > 0) GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('${tz:text}')
SELECT sum("from_grid") - sum("to_grid") as "grid" FROM "kwh"."http" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('${tz:text}')
SELECT mean(/.*voltage.*/) FROM "autogen"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(/.*current.*/) FROM "autogen"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(/^.*POD_nom*/) FROM "pod"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(/.*Fout.*/) FROM "vitals"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("grid_status") +1 FROM "grid"."http" WHERE ("grid_status" = 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(/.*v_out.*/) FROM "vitals"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("grid_status") +1 FROM "grid"."http" WHERE ("grid_status" = 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT *::field from alerts.alerts where $timeFilter

SELECT mean("temperature") AS "Temperature", mean("humidity") AS "Humidity (%)", mean("clouds") AS "Clouds (%)", mean("feels_like") AS "Feels Like" FROM "autogen"."weather" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("snow_1h") AS "Snow", mean("pressure") AS "Pressure", mean("rain_1h") AS "Rain", mean("visibility")  / 1000 AS "Visibility (K)", mean("wind_speed") AS "Wind" FROM "autogen"."weather" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
